sports: I love to watch and play hockey. My favorite team is the Chicago Blackhawks.
I also enjoy playing volleyball, soccer and golf.
media: My favourite movies include: Goodfellas, A Night at the Roxbury, and The Wolf of Wall Street.
My favourite TV shows include: Prison Break, Breaking Bad, The Sopranos, Entourage, and Money Heist.

degree: I attended Queen's University from 2014-2019. I completed my B.ASc. in April 2019, specializing in software engineering.
My main areas of focus are in backend development and database architecture/management. Other areas that I really enjoy are frontend development and application security.
teachingAssistant: Assisting in running a 2 hour lab each week with ~60 students
Being available after hours for extra help
internship: Between 3rd and 4th year, worked in industry as a junior software developer for IFS
More about this in the work section
networkSecurity: Responsible for creating lecture material, running tutorials, and handling logistics and growth of the team
Going over topics such as XSS and SQL injection attacks, reconnaissance, ARP spoofing, packet sniffing, exploits, firewalls, password-cracking, and more
froshWeek: Involved in being one of the leaders for a frosh group during frosh week.

Myself, along with 8 others on a team, led a group of 30 first year students throughout the first week of being at Queen's. The goal was to welcome them to the school, and help them make friends and have a great introduction to what Queen's was like.
qtma: QTMA started a club to launch and support startup ideas. Our team's idea was to create a collaborative music playing app, where users can request and vote on songs in order to determine which ones will get played next.
More about this in the projects section

aboutMe: Hi, I'm Michael Tanel and welcome to my site! I am a recent B.ASc graduate from Queen's University for software engineering, and I am looking for a full-time position as a software developer/technical consultant.

The majority of my consulting work has been involving internal stakeholders from other departments, but I have also done some freelance work for a company where I would recommend software and write reports summarizing how the software solution I chose would solve their business problem.
I really enjoyed this work, and I would like to pursue a career in software development or technical consulting.
aboutWebsite: This website was designed with Angular 7, and Google Material Design.

personalProjects.name: DJ Cloud
personalProjects.description: DJ Cloud: A mobile app that allows people to create a playlist where other users can vote on songs to determine what will be played next.
